Shoot as many enemies as possible in the time limit. For maximum points score headshots and take targets down fast. Be carfeul, they aren’t going down without a fight!

Tirez sur un maximum d'ennemis dans le temps imparti. Pour marquer plus de points, abattez les cibles rapidement et tirez dans la tête. Faites attention, ils ne se laisseront pas faire si facilement !

Schalte innerhalb des Zeitlimits möglichst viele Gegner aus. Um die maximale Punktzahl zu erreichen, musst du Kopfschüsse landen und deine Ziele schnell abschießen. Sei auf der Hut! Sie werden sich nicht kampflos ergeben!
Spara a più nemici possibili nel limite di tempo. Per ottenere il massimo dei punti, spara alla testa e uccidi velocemente. Ma stai attento, non si arrenderanno senza lottare!
Cárgate a todos los enemigos que puedas en el tiempo límite. Para maximizar la puntuación, dales en la cabeza y acaba con ellos rápidamente. Pero ten cuidado, ¡no van a caer sin luchar!
Shoot as many enemies as possible in the time limit. For maximum points score headshots and take targets down fast. Be carfeul, they aren’t going down without a fight!
제한시간 내에 최대한 많은 적을 쏘세요. 최고 점수를 위해서는 헤드샷을 노리고, 목표물을 빠르게 제거하세요. 조심하세요, 그들도 가만히 있지만은 않을 거에요.
Shoot as many enemies as possible in the time limit. For maximum points score headshots and take targets down fast. Be carfeul, they aren’t going down without a fight!
在限時內儘量射擊敵人。要取得最高分數，射擊敵人頭部及快速射中目標。小心，他們不是那麼容易對付！
在限時內儘量射擊敵人。要取得最高分數，射擊敵人頭部及快速射中目標。小心，他們不是那麼容易對付！
Shoot as many enemies as possible in the time limit. For maximum points score headshots and take targets down fast. Be carfeul, they aren’t going down without a fight!
Pass through checkpoints to refill your ammo and receive bonus points.\n
Passez les points de contrôle pour recharger vos munitions et recevoir des points bonus.\n
Passiere die Kontrollpunkte, um deine Munition aufzufüllen und Bonuspunkte zu erhalten.\n
Passa attraverso i checkpoint per ricaricare le tue munizioni e ricevere punti bonus.\n
Atraviesa los puntos de control para recargar tus armas y recibir más puntos.\n
Pass through checkpoints to refill your ammo and receive bonus points.\n
탄약을 얻고 보너스 점수를 획득하기 위하여 체크포인트를 통과하세요. \n
Pass through checkpoints to refill your ammo and receive bonus points.\n
經過確認點，重新裝填子彈，並獲得額外分數。\n
經過確認點，重新裝填子彈，並獲得額外分數。\n
Pass through checkpoints to refill your ammo and receive bonus points.\n
Pick-ups will spawn around the Yeti arena, grab them for a little extra help in your hunting.\n
Des points de chargement apparaîtront autour de l'arène Yeti, attrapez-les pour une petite aide supplémentaire lorsque vous chassez.\n
Rund um die Yeti-Arena werden Energiepunkte auftauchen. Greife sie dir als kleine Extra-Unterstützung bei der Jagd.\n
Intorno alla Yeti arena compariranno degli oggetti da raccogliere, prendili per avere un aiuto in più nella caccia.\n
Aparecerán mejoras en la Plaza Yeti, búscalas para que te ayuden en tu cacería.\n
Pick-ups will spawn around the Yeti arena, grab them for a little extra help in your hunting.\n
설인 광장 여기저기에 필드 아이템이 생겨납니다. 아이템을 획득하시면 사냥에 도움이 될꺼에요. \n
Pick-ups will spawn around the Yeti arena, grab them for a little extra help in your hunting.\n
輔助道具散落於雪人廣場。拾起這些道具，能在打獵時為您提供一點額外幫助。
輔助道具散落於雪人廣場。拾起這些道具，能在打獵時為您提供一點額外幫助。
Pick-ups will spawn around the Yeti arena, grab them for a little extra help in your hunting.\n
Buy power-ups at the main menu or the Yeti arena kiosk. Equip them in the loadout screen to give you the edge over your enemies and opposition!
Achetez des power-ups au menu principal ou au kiosque de l'arène Yeti. Équipez-les à l'écran de chargement afin de vous donner l'avantage sur vos ennemis et vos adversaires!
Kaufe dir Power-ups im Hauptmenü oder am Kiosk in der Yeti-Arena. Rüste sie im Ausrüstungs-Bildschirm aus, um dir einen Vorteil gegenüber deinen Feinden und der Gegenseite zu verschaffen!
Acquista potenziamenti nel menu principale o al chiosco della Yeti arena. Potrai aggiungerli alla schermata equipaggiamento per avere un vantaggio su nemici e avversari!
Compra mejoras en el menú principal o en el quiosco de la Plaza Yeti. ¡Equípate con ellas en la pantalla de carga para obtener la ventaja que necesitas sobre el enemigo!
Buy power-ups at the main menu or the Yeti arena kiosk. Equip them in the loadout screen to give you the edge over your enemies and opposition!
메인 메뉴 또는 설인 광장의 상점에서 파워업 아이템을 구매하세요. 구매한 아이템을 로드아웃 화면에서 사용하면 적들과 그들의 반발에 우위를 점할 수 있을겁니다!
Buy power-ups at the main menu or the Yeti arena shop. Equip them in the loadout screen to give you the edge over your enemies and opposition!
在主選單或雪人廣場商店購買增強道具。在裝備畫面裝備增強道具，讓您比敵人技勝一籌！
在主選單或雪人廣場商店購買增強道具。在裝備畫面裝備增強道具，讓您比敵人技勝一籌！
Buy power-ups at the main menu or the Yeti arena kiosk. Equip them in the loadout screen to give you the edge over your enemies and opposition!
Activate power-ups by pressing either [LEFT] or [RIGHT] as shown on the HUD.
Activez des améliorations en appuyant sur [LEFT] ou [RIGHT] comme indiqué à l'écran.
Aktiviere Power-ups, indem du entweder [LEFT] oder [RIGHT] drückst, wie auf dem Head-up-Display gezeigt wird.
Attiva i potenziamenti premendo [LEFT] o [RIGHT] come mostrato sull'interfaccia di gioco.
Para activar las mejoras pulsa [LEFT] o [RIGHT] como se muestra en el HUD.
Activate power-ups by pressing either [LEFT] or [RIGHT] as shown on the HUD.
HUD에서 보이는 것 처럼, [LEFT] 또는 [RIGHT]를 눌러서 파워업 아이템을 사용하세요.
Activate power-ups by pressing either [LEFT] or [RIGHT] as shown on the HUD.
按照畫面顯示按 [LEFT] 或 [RIGHT] 來啟動增強道具。
按照畫面顯示按 [LEFT] 或 [RIGHT] 來啟動增強道具。
Activate power-ups by pressing either [LEFT] or [RIGHT] as shown on the HUD.
Power-ups that last the whole game will be activated automatically when the game starts.
Les améliorations qui durent tout le long de la partie seront activées automatiquement au début de la partie.
Beim Spielstart werden automatisch Power-ups aktiviert, die das ganze Spiel über andauern.
I potenziamenti che durano per tutta la partita verranno attivati automaticamente all'inizio.
Al comenzar la partida se activarán automáticamente mejoras que duran hasta el final.
Power-ups that last the whole game will be activated automatically when the game starts.
게임진행 시간동안 지속되는 파워업 아이템은 게임 시작과 동시에 자동으로 활성화됩니다.
Power-ups that last the whole game will be activated automatically when the game starts.
遊戲開始時，上一場遊戲最後使用的增強道具便會自動啟動。
